mapper.select:
select row_number() over(order by i.imat_date desc) as imat_num,i.imat_cd, i.imat_date, p.prod_cd, p.prod_nm,p.prod_unit, i.imat_stg, i.imat_count, c.cli_cd, c.cli_nm, i.imat_note from product p left join client c on c.cli_cd=p.cli_cd join in_material i on i.prod_cd=p.prod_cd
where i.imat_cd like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
and p.prod_cd like CONCAT('%',#{search2},'%')
and i.imat_stg like CONCAT('%',#{search3},'%')
limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

select * from product
where prod_cd like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
and prod_nm like CONCAT('%',#{search2},'%')
and prod_mat like CONCAT('%',#{search3},'%')
limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

select row_number() over(order by i.imat_cd asc) as imat_num,p.prod_cd,p.prod_nm,p.prod_mat,p.prod_unit,imat_count-omat_count as iomat_count from product p join in_material i on p.prod_cd=i.prod_cd join out_material o on p.prod_cd=o.prod_cd

select count(*) from in_material
where imat_cd like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
and prod_cd like CONCAT('%',#{search2},'%')
and imat_stg like CONCAT('%',#{search3},'%')
select max(cast(SUBSTRING(imat_cd,3) as unsigned)) from in_material;
mapper.update: update in_material set imat_cd = #{imat_cd}, prod_cd = #{prod_cd}, imat_stg = #{imat_stg},imat_count = #{imat_count},imat_note = #{imat_note} where imat_cd = #{imat_cd}
